DOC.detailed_description: Setting : The study conduct June 2017 June 2020 short stay unit Pediatric Emergency Center ( PEC ) Hamad General Hospital , pediatric emergency facility State Qatar . Infants age ≤3 month present unit treatment viral bronchiolitis positive RSV test eligible study . Procedure : Eligible patient enrol obtain write consent . For patient consent , plain chest radiography , nasopharyngeal swab take RSV detection . If patient positive RSV rapid antigen test , patient randomize one study arm . Adverse effect group carefully monitor document . Study Intervention : Patients randomize two treatment arm Group 1 : Early HHHFNC Group Patients group treat use heat humidified high flow oxygen /air via nasal cannula ; investigator keep patient HHHFNC he/she become clinically ready discharge . Group 2 : Standard Therapy Rescue HHHFNC Group : patient group treat usual therapy , investigator use low flow nasal cannula oxygen therapy oxygenation need maintain Oxygen saturation ( SpO2 ) ≥ 92 % , patient deteriorate require ICU , rescue HHHFNC start admission ICU .
